sensitivity module¶

class sensitivity.Sensitivity(data_folder='Data', models_folder='Models', working_folder='Working_Folder', sim_data_folder='sensitivity_data', sim_plots_folder='sensitivity_plots')¶

Bases: pipeline.Pipeline

This module provides the user with a complete pipeline of scripts for computing model sensitivity analysis using Copasi
